What are the symptoms of Mitral Valve Prolapse ?,"Most people who have mitral valve prolapse (MVP) aren't affected by the condition. They don't have any symptoms or major mitral valve backflow.
                
When MVP does cause signs and symptoms, they may include:
                
Palpitations (feelings that your heart is skipping a beat, fluttering,
